Text; the endpoint must be chosen from the Endpoint table, namely the list of endpoints given in Annex III. The table in the endpoints should be expandable by the administrator.

with equation editor (if applicable). If the algorithm cannot be reported, it is asked to report the main reference describing the algorithm. Probably, this reference should be chosen from one of the records (references included in fiels XX)

The training set appended includes 256 compounds and it includes the following descriptor values: lopP, HOMO, LUMO.
